S.FORM: == Al Brightman == siwkay niza Al Brightman (9 a bulad 22 a demiad, 1923 a mihcan), miunduay. (mapatay i 1992 a mihca), mimali ciniza i Amilika NBA. napasubana' i Siyatu tabakiay a cacudadan. u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika Al Brightman was an American professional basketball player and coach. Born in Eureka, California, he played collegiately for the California State University, Long Beach, and was drafted by the Cleveland Indians out of Wilson High School in Long Beach, Ca. kakuniza kalunasulitan-sulu

== Al Brightman == siwkay niza Al Brightman (9 a bolad 22 a demiad, 1923 a mihcan), miondoay. (mapatay i 1992 a mihca), mimali ciniza i Amilika NBA. napasobana' i Siyato tabakiay a cacodadan. o solit no Holam ato Amilika Al Brightman was an American professional basketball player and coach. Born in Eoreka, California, he played collegiately for the California State University, Long Beach, and was drafted by the Cleveland Indians oot of Wilson High School in Long Beach, Ca. kakoniza kalonasolitan-solo
